make a raiding archer. this is what I like doing. heavy armour good bow and a good sword companion. I like just going down the road and attacking hosts of imperial and stormcloak soldier. go stealth first, take a shot or two from behind and make sure to be decent with one handed weapons. once they get too close draw your sword, cut them down and then pick the rest of them off with your bow. it's a fun way to role play a raider in my opinion.
